DOC.detailed_description: Treatment relapsed/refractory multiple myeloma ( MM ) remain crucial challenge.The investigator previously show combination paclitaxel cyclophosphamide act synergistically induce apoptosis myeloma cell vitro . Based preclinical study , investigator initiate phase II clinical trial paclitaxel 175 mg/m ( 2 ) IV 3 h d1 combine cyclophosphamide 200 mg/m ( 2 ) IV 30-60 min d1,3,5 dexamethasone 20mg IV 30-60 min d1-4 patient relapse refractory MM . This regimen administer every four week total six cycle
